Workshop of the Places and COCO Challenges at ICCV 2017

Overview

Important Dates

  • June 25, 2017: Development kits and data are available.
  • Sep.30, 2017: Submission deadline (Check COCO challenge page and Places Challenge page for the latest news)
  • Oct.10, 2017: Challenge results released.
  • Oct.29, 2017: Joint COCO and Places Challenge Workshop (full-day)
